title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Competencies: Digital Courseware-Based Traditional Chinese Medicine Practice Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Core concepts of traditional Chinese medicine (Yinyang-Wuxing, meridian theory, etc.) can be explained with over 85% accuracy through digital simulations
Customized treatment planning projects can be completed for patient cases using digital courseware
The ability to interpret TCM terminology and diagnostic techniques with 90% accuracy in mobile environments can be cultivated

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
